product_name: Columbia Fast Trek II Full-Zip Fleece Jacket - Men's Tall - 2013 Closeout
long_description: While the men's tall-size Fast Trek II Full-Zip Fleece Jacket from Columbia keeps you toasty as you hike, it's so comfortable you'll find yourself wearing it around town on weekends, too. Lightweight yet warm 250g polyester microfleece is supersoft and washes well. Zippered chest pocket stashes your phone or keys securely. Raglan sleeves eliminate shoulder seams, enhancing range of motion and comfort under pack straps. Columbia Fast Trek II Full-Zip Fleece Jacket for tall men features handwarmer pockets. Closeout.
short_description: While the men's tall-size Fast Trek II Full-Zip Fleece Jacket from Columbia keeps you toasty as you hike, it's so comfortable you'll find yourself wearing it around town on weekends, too.
